trans-unit.source: Thrown when SQL write fails because the table is unwriteable
trans-unit.target: Thrown when SQL write fails because the table is unwriteable

trans-unit.source: This error is produced when trying to write to a SQL table and the table cannot be written to.
trans-unit.target: This error is produced when trying to write to a SQL table and the table cannot be written to.

trans-unit.source: You will receive this error if the Writer successfully establishes a connection with the SQL server but is then unable to write the dataset to the datatable.
trans-unit.target: You will receive this error if the Writer successfully establishes a connection with the SQL server but is then unable to write the dataset to the datatable.

trans-unit.source: Revisit the module and verify that the database and table names are entered correctly.
trans-unit.target: Revisit the module and verify that the database and table names are entered correctly.

trans-unit.source: Verify that the SQL login associated with the user name and password has permissions enabled to write to the table.
trans-unit.target: Verify that the SQL login associated with the user name and password has permissions enabled to write to the table.

trans-unit.source: If the exception contains additional error information from SQL, use that information to make corrections.
trans-unit.target: If the exception contains additional error information from SQL, use that information to make corrections.

trans-unit.source: Connected to server, unable to write to table.
trans-unit.target: Connected to server, unable to write to table.

trans-unit.source: Unable to write to Sql table: {0}
trans-unit.target: Unable to write to Sql table: {0}
